co-founder Netmums: More information, but more confusion for parents Mrs Russell says, while Mr Michael Gove 's new measure gives parents more information, there is a risk that parents will be confused. More information being available is always good. But I think having a new measure will lead to a lot of confusion amongst parents. Does it mean that a good school is now not so good? Mrs Russell says the new benchmark of pupils achieving good grades in five academic subjects opens up a debate of what subjects should be taught. Kevin Stannard, Girls' Day School Trust: Mixed view
